page.title: 03LIFE STYLES
page.content: On Friday 31st May I woke up at 5am.Dad came through and said,"Get your clothes because I'm off in the Wagon."I put my clothes on,went down stairs picked up Dads bait box and got in the car.Dad backed the car up the Lonning.At Stampers we put the bedding stuff in the wagon.I got in and sat down and waited for dad to come back. Then we set off for Glasgow we went N up the M6 to reach Glasgow.At Carlisle we joined the A74.We passed through some hills.When we reached Glasgow we had to go down by the Airport to get to Bishopton.We had some Massey tractor parts for them then we had our breakfasts.Then we returned to Glasgow.Dad had to pull up at the road side we went in and got a man to help lift the parcels off.Then we went to Stirling.We took some parcels of the wagon.Next we went to Cupar Fife where
